item.title: BnaA01.FD
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: BnaA01G0026200ZS Gene Symbol: BnaA01.FD Gene Name: Genome: ZS11 reference genome Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: The study describes the function of TFL1 paralogs in rapeseed and how BnTFL1–BnGF14nu–BnFD regulates flowering, plant architecture, and seed yield.

item.title: FveFT3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: FvH4_3g09870 Gene Symbol: FveFT3 Gene Name: FLOWERING LOCUS T 3 Genome: Species: Fragaria vesca Functional Descriptions: The FveFT2 florigen/FveTFL1 antiflorigen balance is critical for the control of seasonal flowering in strawberry while FveFT3 modulates axillary meristem fate and yield.

item.title: GhCUC2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhCUC2 Gene Name: CUP-SHAPED COTYLEDON2 Genome: reference genome TM-1 (AD1) genome NAU-NBI Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: The miR164-GhCUC2-GhBRC1 module regulates plant architecture through abscisic acid in cotton.

item.title: GhDREB1B
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_D12G245100 Gene Symbol: GhDREB1B Gene Name: Genome: TM-1 reference genome Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: A copy number variant at the HPDA locus on Chromosome D12 (HPDA-D12), encoding a dehydration-responsive element-binding (DREB) transcription factor, GhDREB1B, strongly affects plant architecture in the AS98 mutant.

item.title: GhPAS1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_D12G0607 Gene Symbol: GhPAS1 Gene Name: PAGODA1 SUPPRESSOR 1 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: The bHLH transcription factor GhPAS1 mediates BR signaling to regulate plant development and architecture in cotton.

item.title: GmIT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.05G157300 Gene Symbol: GmIT1 Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Ideal type 1 (GmIT1) is caused by a point mutation in the α-tubulin gene that affects microtubule arrangement in soybean.

item.title: GmMYB14
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.19g164600 Gene Symbol: GmMYB14 Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmMYB14-OX plants showed reduced endogenous BR contents, while exogenous application of brassinolide could partly rescue the phenotype of GmMYB14-OX plants.

item.title: GmPIN1a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.08G054700 Gene Symbol: GmPIN1a Gene Name: PINFORMED1 Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmPIN1-mediated auxin asymmetry regulates leaf petiole angle and plant architecture in soybean.

item.title: GmRR1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.09g040000 Gene Symbol: GmRR1 Gene Name: a soybean type-B Response Regulator 1 Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Soybean type-B response regulator GmRR1 mediates phosphorus uptake and yield by modifying root architecture.

item.title: MtLUX
